name: Lego Unity Project
description:
Title: Lego Unity Game 

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Collect the gems to win the game. Avoid the death blocks and shooters. 

Instructions: Use the space bar to jump, arrow keys to move character, and the mouse to look around. Touch gems to collect them and if you touch a death block you die. If one of the shooters shoot you, you die. 

 Game Design Team: Cadence Pruitt – Game Designer
